変数

変数宣言 グローバル変数
C++ int v = 10; int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言
C# int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
}
Java int v = 10; public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
}
PHP $v = 10; global $g = 10;
JS var v = 10; window.g = 10;
Ruby v = 10; $g = 10;
Python 未 未
Perl 未 未
C++ C# Java PHP JS Ruby Python Perl
変数宣言 int v = 10; int v = 10; int v = 10; $v = 10; var v = 10; v = 10; 未 未
グローバル変数 int g = 10; // 関数外で宣言 public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		public static class G{
   public static int g = 10;
} 		global $g = 10; window.g = 10; $g = 10; 未 未
